Package org.raxa.service.updater

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlertSetter
    This class sets all thread each containing information about which patient to be called,what message to play etc.It pass AlertInfo Object for alert.
    ReminderUpdate
    Set alerts for today
    StartUpdater  
    Updater
    Checks every pollingHours Hours if the day has changed or not.If it has changed then it will update the database.
